thread.title: Deborah Lunn
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Deborah Lunn

author: Deborah Lunn
title: Deborah Lunn
text: Jason delivery guy on truck 16 left a 4 inch blade in my house completely open on my couch. Thank goodness my hand found it and not my daughters or the dogs. Days later when he finally came to claim his knife he tried to bribe me with a $100.00 bill. I did not accept his bribe.
